QuestData.Title: Heart of the Sepulcher
QuestData.Description:
Soon after we stepped forth into the realms of Death, a message left behind by the Primus gave warning that the Jailer must not be allowed to reach the Sepulcher.
Despite all our efforts, he has done so.
Within the heart of that ancient place lie secrets the Jailer could use to dominate the entire cosmos. If he succeeds, everything we hold dear will be lost.
Gather your allies, $n. Claim victory for the Shadowlands... and for Azeroth.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The Jailer cannot be allowed to enact his plan. The fate of all creation is in your hands. Stop him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Jailer in the Sepulcher of the First Ones.
QuestData.RewardText:
At long last, our campaign is at an end. Thanks to you, the Jailer has been defeated.
Your efforts have saved us all, $n.
